attributes.action: MP's on zero hour contracts, acountable & performance tested (independently)!!!
attributes.additional_details: Let the people decide how their lives are run!!! Real democracy..
attributes.background: As it would help to streamline the political industry & deal with corruption.

rejection.details: Petitions need to ask clearly for a specific action. We're not sure from your petition what a zero hours contract for MPs would mean, how you would like MPs to be held accountable, or how you would like performance to be tested. You could start a new petition explaining more clearly what action you are asking for.
